snippet.title: Title: Boutroux curves with external field: equilibrium measures without a minimization problem
snippet.description:
Title: Boutroux curves with external field: equilibrium measures without a minimization problem
Authors: Marco Bertola
Comments: 37 pages, 12 figures, 3 animations. Version 2: minor corrections and improved presentation. Version 3: small but critical correction on page 18-19. No change in conclusions
Journal-ref: Analysis and Mathematical Physics, vol. 1, no. 2, 2011, 167--211
Subjects: Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems (nlin.SI); Mathematical Physics (math-ph)
